name: Queerfeed Media
tag_list: gay, lesbian, lgbt, queer, bisexual, location-based, mobile-app, foursquare, gowalla, dating
overview:
Queerfeed Media, based in Toronto, Canada, is licensed to operate http://www.queerfeed.com - a web service that enables gay, lesbian, bisexual and transgendered people to interact by sharing local information, status updates, videos, events and links. Queerfeed is one of the first services that combines elements of Twitter, Digg and Yelp into one application tailored specifically to LGBT audiences.

Queerfeed is testing, and within a few weeks will launch, a mobile service built to provide LGBT audiences location-based functionality similar to what products like Foursquare and Gowalla provide to the ‘everyone’ audience. Queerfeed plans to be the dominant player in LGBT location-based social media.

Although Queerfeed is not specifically positioned as a dating service, it is expected that some users will use the service to ‘hook up’ with those in close geographical proximity by’checking into’ real-World locations on mobile devices.

More information can be obtained by emailing info@queerfeed.com or by calling +1-650-488-7899.
